meanings.definition: The act of lifting a barbell from the ground to a standing position using the muscles of the legs and back.
meanings.sent1: Deadlifting requires strong leg and back muscles.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of people deadlifting at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried deadlifting a pencil but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like deadlifting a heavy burden off her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The image of him deadlifting the heavy barbell stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: The exercise of deadlifting is commonly used to strengthen the lower body and improve overall fitness.
meanings.sent1: Regular deadlifting can help build muscle in the legs.
meanings.sent2: She felt sore after a session of deadlifting.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin deadlifting made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to deadlifting was as strong as his determination to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The sound of weights clanking while deadlifting echoed in the gym.
